applicationLogic.journal
Class Transaction

java.lang.Object
  applicationLogic.journal.Transaction

public class Transaction
extends java.lang.Object

This class is a data type which holds informations on a given transaction. A transaction is a set of journals. Each stored journal is ordered by its volume number. This class also provides a set of methods to handle parts of the transaction and to and to extract some properties, as Authors-Publications and Publication-Authors bar charts.

Author:
Staffiero

Constructor Detail

Transaction

public Transaction(dblp.social.hibernate.ISodaHibernateSession session,
                   java.lang.String transactionName)
            throws dblp.social.exceptions.SodaHibernateException
This constructor initializes the Transaction object loading all the journals of the given transaction. All the Journals are lazily fetched, i.e. relation fields will not be available without a further query to the database.

Parameters:
session - a SodaHibernateSession used to query the database.
transactionName - the transaction short name. For example tse, tosem, ecc...
Throws:
dblp.social.exceptions.SodaHibernateException

getAllJournals

getJournalByVolume

public dblp.social.hibernate.entities.Journal getJournalByVolume(int volume)
Parameters:
volume - a volume number.
Returns:
the Journal of this transaction matching the given volume number, or null if such a Journal does not exist.

getJournalsUntilVolume

public java.util.List<dblp.social.hibernate.entities.Journal> getJournalsUntilVolume(int volume)
Parameters:
volume - a volume number
Returns:
a list of Journals whose number is lesser or equal than the given volume number or null if there is no Journal matching the given volume number

isEmpty

public boolean isEmpty()
Test if the current transaction contains at least one Journal

Returns:
true if at least one Journal exists in the current transaction, false otherwise.

getAuthorsPublications

public java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> getAuthorsPublications()
                                                         throws dblp.social.exceptions.SodaHibernateException
Returns a List of integer representing a bar chart in which for a given number of co-authors we can find the respective number of publications. I.e. we can know how many publications are authored by a certain number of co-authors. The whole set of publications and authors of the current transaction is considered.

Returns:
a List of integer representing the Authors-Publications bar chart.
Throws:
dblp.social.exceptions.SodaHibernateException

getPublicationsAuthors

public java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> getPublicationsAuthors()
                                                         throws dblp.social.exceptions.SodaHibernateException
Returns a List of integer representing a bar chart in which for a given number of publications we can find the respective number of authors. I.e. we can know how many authors authored a certain number of publications. The whole set of publications and authors of the current transaction is considered.

Returns:
a List of integer representing the Publications-Authors bar chart.
Throws:
dblp.social.exceptions.SodaHibernateException

getAuthorsPublicationsPerVolume

public java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> getAuthorsPublicationsPerVolume(int volume)
                                                                  throws dblp.social.exceptions.SodaHibernateException
Returns a List of integer representing the Authors-Publications bar chart considering only the given volume number.

Parameters:
volume - the volume number of interest
Returns:
a List of integer representing the Authors-Publications histogram.
Throws:
dblp.social.exceptions.SodaHibernateException

getAuthorsPublicationsUntilVolume

public java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> getAuthorsPublicationsUntilVolume(int volume)
                                                                    throws dblp.social.exceptions.SodaHibernateException
Returns a List of integer representing the Authors-Publications histogram considering all the proceedings until the given volume number.

Parameters:
volume - the volume number of interest
Returns:
a List of integer representing the Authors-Publications histogram.
Throws:
dblp.social.exceptions.SodaHibernateException

getAuthorsPublicationsNumber

public java.util.List<Author> getAuthorsPublicationsNumber()
                                                    throws dblp.social.exceptions.SodaHibernateException
Returns sorted array of authors. For each author the number of publications is set. All the publications of the current transaction are considered, from the first to the last volume.

Returns:
a List of Author sorted by publications number.
Throws:
dblp.social.exceptions.SodaHibernateException

volumeExists

private boolean volumeExists(int volume)
Test if a Journal with the given volume exists in the current transaction.

Parameters:
volume - the volume number to check.
Returns:
true if a Journal with the given volume exists, false otherwise.
